title: Introduction to DevOps
headline: Learn how DevOps can bring significant benefits to a business with this free software development course.
description: This free online introduction to DevOps course will introduce you to concepts and practices behind DevOps which can lead to improved customer satisfaction, improved productivity and efficiency, and the increased ability to build the right product by fast experimentation. You will learn its benefits as a collaboration and communication methodology for both software developers and other information-technology (IT) professionals, and more!
courseDescription:
This course begins by discussing the benefits of DevOps. High performing organizations are twice as likely to exceed their profitability, market share, and productivity goals with DevOps, allowing you to have more room for change and more stability at the same time. With this course, you will learn some of the DevOps practices and load testing. You will also learn about infrastructure as code and how continuous integration has changed over time.

You will then study the difference between continuous deployment and release management. There are three stages of deployment namely Development, Staging, and Production. With this course, you will learn to measure how long it takes for someone to approve a stage. Next, you will study the role of agents in DevOps as well as look into advanced DevOps practices, application performance monitoring, availability monitoring, and configuration management. In addition, you will also learn how artefacts can be used in DevOps.

DevOps can bring significant benefits such as shorter time-to-market, better product quality, and more reliable releases. Upon the completion of this course, you will have a better understanding of the different aspects of DevOps and use it to establish a culture and environment where building, testing, and releasing software can happen rapidly, frequently, and more reliably. Check out this free online course to enhance your software development skills and boost your career now!

  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.

Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:

  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
